docs.title: Welcome to the General Handbook
docs.text:
This handbook helps patients and visitors navigate departments, referrals, and services.

⚠️ This site is for general information only. For emergencies, call 995 or visit the Emergency Department.

docs.title: Start here
docs.text:
• If you have symptoms and don’t know which department to visit → How to Use This Handbook
  • If you know your department → See All Departments
  • For official hospital information, visit:
  • Changi General Hospital Website
  • Patient & Visitor Info

docs.title: 🏥 Emergency Department (ED)
docs.text:
The Emergency Department (ED) at Changi General Hospital (CGH) provides 24-hour emergency care for all patients — locals, tourists, and foreign visitors.

📍 Location: Main Building, Level 1 & 2 📞 Hotline: (+65) 6850 3333 🔗 Official info: https://www.cgh.com.sg/clinic-visit/visiting-the-ed

Key Sections - What to Expect at the ED - Triage & Waiting Times - ED Charges - Critical Care Services - Post-Visit Information
